thread.section_title: Gamesdeal.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamesdeal.com | www.gamesdeal.com
thread.title: Robert Kerr

author: Robert Kerr
title: Robert Kerr
text:
order 3x packs of 2200 pc fifa coins, website says buy now, get code emailed, download and play instantly. on my account says order 2100002585 is completed. This is not the case at all.
after registering and purchasing i got email confirming my order which at just after 11pm said to wait to sometime after after 3.30am before I would get my codes. Hardly complete
I would never of bought from you if you had been honest and had this written up on your site or written on the screen very clearly that this was the case. Cdkeys and other websites I use don't do this and send you the codes instantly without such a large delay. Will probally not use again. terrible service.
